name: Remove background in images from Google Photos and upload them back to Google Photos
description:
When an image is added to a monitored album in Google Photos, Picsart automatically removes the background and re-uploads the processed image back to Google Photos album.

This template was created by Picsart and not tested by Make. For any inquiries about the template, please reach out to the template creator: apidevsupport@picsart.com.
